require(package = "rAmCharts", quietly = TRUE)

# Basic example

```{r}
data_mekko <- data.frame(var1 = c(rep("A1", 150), rep("A2", 350), rep("A3", 500)),
                         var2 = sample(c("B1", "B2", "B3", "B4", "B5", "B6"), 
                                       1000, replace = TRUE))

amMekko(x = "var1", y = "var2", data = data_mekko) %>>% plot()
```
